name: Snow Prado Drive
description: Snow Prado Drive  is an amazing Prado driving simulation game where user skill of driving will be tested as the driver has to drive the prado to uphill snow tracks and the user will have to pass all checkpoints to complete levels. Drive the Prado on  slippery snow tracks where managing a vehicle is an art. Control the vehicle and take the challenge heads on as being the Prado driver you compete snowy hills and prove yourself around the world.
